text: jaan lo ki saansaarik jeevan ek khel, manoranjan, shobha,[1] aapas mein garv tatha ek-doosare se badh jaane ka prayaas hai, dhanon tatha santaan mein. us varsha ke samaan bha gayee kisaanon ko jisakee upaj, phir vah pak gayee, to tum use dekhane lage peelee, phir vah ho jaatee hai choor-choor aur paralok mein kadee yaatana hai tatha allaah kee kshama aur prasannata hai aur saansaarik jeevan to bas dhokhe ka sansaadhan hai
